description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Gianyar, Indonesia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Secluded Adults-Only Central Bali Jungle Escape with Restaurant, Bar & Spa
hotels.description: Forget everything you know about traditional hotels - at Buahan, sixteen open-air bales float like dream pods above Bali's untamed jungle. Adults-only bliss meets raw wilderness in the Indonesian island's best-kept secret, where guests breathe with the forest, sleep beneath the stars and wake with birdsong. Watch culinary wizards work their magic at the open kitchen, where 70% plant-based menus shine through a zero-waste philosophy. The Botanist Bar crafts liquid poetry from garden-fresh herbs, while Toja Spa channels ancient Balinese healing wisdom through expert hands. Every sip, bite and treatment connects you deeper to this island's soul and centuries-old traditions. Perched where seven sacred peaks kiss the sky, Buahan commands Bali's most jaw-dropping view. The Ayung River trickles gently below while untouched jungle stretches endlessly before the infinity pool. This is nature's VIP lounge, where adventure doesn't knock - it surrounds you.

hotels.title: Bali Five-Star Colonial-Style Beachfront Escape with Beach Pavilion Dining
hotels.description: Transport yourself to a state of pure bliss with a stay at the beachfront Rumah Luwih, Bali - a five-star hideaway near world-renowned surfing and diving spots. Styled after a classic colonial Indonesian mansion, Rumah Luwih offers pure elegance in the tranquil province of Gianyar, loved for its outstanding food and popular Pasar Senggol night market. Lounge by the pool overlooking the ocean, soothe your senses at the spa and sample Indonesian specialities at Andrawina Restaurant.

seo.title: Hotel a Gianyar - Indonesia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Gianyar, Indonesia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
